snippet: The brewing giant is trying to keep the pressure up on its longtime rival in hopes of securing the largest beer merger in history before a looming deadline.
abstract: Anheuser-Busch InBev believes its latest offer for SABMiller is fair enough to secure deal before looming deadline.
lead_paragraph: The brewing giant is trying to keep the pressure up on its longtime rival in hopes of securing the largest beer merger in history before a looming deadline.

headline.main: Anheuser-Busch InBev Says It’s ‘Surprised’ by SABMiller Rejection
headline.print_headline: Anheuser-Busch InBev Says Its Bid for SABMiller Is Fair
